alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 9:13AM AKST until December 14 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...East Turnagain Arm from near Bird Point to Portage. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of locally dense fog have formed along the Seward Highway in Turnagain Arm from Portage west to near Bird Point. These areas of fog will continue through noon today.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
